Q: In the 80s who wrote the novel Empire of The Sun?
A: The novel Empire of the Sun was written by J.G. Ballard. It was published in 1984. The novel is set in Shanghai during the Japanese occupation of China during World War II, and it follows the story of a young boy named Jim Graham and his experiences during this time. The novel was later adapted into a film directed by Steven Spielberg in 1987.
